text: It was our pleasure to have you as our wedding planners for our Wedding in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.Our guest really
left: appreciated the cocktail night before the marriage where they were entertained by the Rajasthani Fold Dancers.
name: ROHIT KUMAR

text: To begin with we are extremely obliged to Okasion Xperts for organizing memorable for us. We are from New York and we
left: had decided to have our weeding in an India following our culture and tradition.
name: Babita Garg

text: Thank you very much for helping us co-ordinate our wedding. We had a fantastic day and everything ran smoothly thanks to
left: your help. The ballroom looked amazing and the service was fantastic.
name: Khushwant Singh

text: Thank you for all your hard work in organising our wedding reception. Luke and I were extremely impressed with your
left: professionalism and patience! We had an amazing time and we were very happy with the service
name: Sumit Kumar

text: Thank you, thank you, thank you for all your help, advice and support with planning our wedding at the InterContinental. The
left: reception was unbelievable, exactly how we imagined and more!.
name: Gurmit Singh
